column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////I was looking through the menu to find a classic Chicago's deep dish
column2: and the restaurant's menu suggested that the Malnati's Chicago Classic is made with a sausage that is the specialty of the restaurant and also with their famous Buttercrust.  So we decided to order a small sized Malnati's Chicago Classic
column4: and also to get an order of wings as appetiser.  My sister had
column6: already decided she also wants the Chocolate Chip Pizza for dessert.  She has a sweet tooth just like I do.
